definitions.text: give entirely to a specific person, activity, or cause
examples: She committed herself to the work of God
give one's talents to a good cause
consecrate your life to the church

definitions.text: open to public use, as of a highway, park, or building
examples: The Beauty Queen spends her time dedicating parks and nursing homes

definitions.text: inscribe or address by way of compliment
examples: She dedicated her book to her parents

definitions.text: set apart to sacred uses with solemn rites, of a church
